physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Neurologic examination was essentially unremarkable. Liver function test results were normal. Liver biopsy showed trace positivity for amyloid by special stains.

Explanted liver measured 24.5 cm and had a dark red, tan cut surface. No masses, nodules, nor evidence of cirrhosis were noted. Histologically, the liver parenchymal involvement was striking with extensive amyloid deposits.

Explanted liver measured 23.5 cm and had a musky, dark, and somewhat variegated cut surface. No masses, nodules, nor evidence of cirrhosis were noted. Identical microscopic features to Case 1 were observed.
